resp = client.indices.close(
    index="my-index-000001",
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.indices.put_settings(
    index="my-index-000001",
    settings={
        "analysis": {
            "analyzer": {
                "content": {
                    "type": "custom",
                    "tokenizer": "whitespace"
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp1)

resp2 = client.indices.open(
    index="my-index-000001",
)
print(resp2)
